   16: 
   17: -module(conf_reload_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -define(RELOADED_DOMAIN, ct:get_config(ejabberd_reloaded_domain)).
   25: 
   26: -define(SAMPLE_USERNAME, <<"astrid">>).
   27: -define(RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, astrid).
   28: -define(INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, alice).
   29: 
   30: -define(CTL_RELOAD_OUTPUT_PREFIX,
   31:         "# Reloaded: " ++ atom_to_list(ct:get_config(ejabberd_node))).
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Suite configuration
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: 
   37: all() ->
   38:     [{group, xmpp_domain_local_reload}].
   39: 
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [{xmpp_domain_local_reload, [],
   42:       [domain_should_change,
   43:        user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_ctl,
   44:        user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_xmpp,
   45:        user_should_be_disconnected_from_removed_domain]}].
   46: 
   47: suite() ->
   48:     [{required, ejabberd_reloaded_domain} | escalus:suite()].
   49: 
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: %% Init & teardown
   52: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   53: 
   54: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   55:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config0),
   56:     ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config1).
   57: 
   58: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   59:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   60: 
   61: init_per_group(xmpp_domain_local_reload, Config0) ->
   62:     F = fun(Cfg) ->
   63:                 change_domain_in_config_file(Cfg)
   64:         end,
   65:     Config1 = create_user_in_initial_domain(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER,
   66:                                             Config0),
   67:     [{new_hosts_value, [?RELOADED_DOMAIN]},
   68:      {modify_config_file_fun, F} | Config1].
   69: 
   70: end_per_group(xmpp_domain_local_reload, Config) ->
   71:     delete_user_in_initial_domain(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, Config).
   72: 
   73: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0) ->
   74:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0),
   75:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   76:     run_config_file_modification_fun(Config1),
   77:     Config1.
   78: 
   79: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   80:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config),
   81:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
   82:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: %% Tests
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: 
   88: domain_should_change(Config) ->
   89:     %% GIVEN
   90:     NewHosts = ?config(new_hosts_value, Config),
   91:     ?assertNot(NewHosts == get_ejabberd_hosts()),
   92: 
   93:     %% WHEN
   94:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
   95: 
   96:     %% THEN
   97:     ?assertMatch(NewHosts, get_ejabberd_hosts()).
   98: 
   99: user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_ctl(Config) ->
  100:     %% GIVEN
  101:     [NewHost] = ?config(new_hosts_value, Config),
  102:     ?assertMatch({cannot_register, _}, register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(
  103:                                          ?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)),
  104: 
  105:     %% WHEN
  106:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
  107: 
  108:     %% THEN
  109:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(
  110:                             ?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)),
  111:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, unregister_user_by_ejabberd_admin(
  112:                             ?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)).
  113: 
  114: user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_xmpp(Config) ->
  115:     %% GIVEN
  116:     UserDomain = get_user_domain(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER),
  117:     ?assert(lists:member(UserDomain, ?config(new_hosts_value, Config))),
  118: 
  119:     %% WHEN
  120:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
  121: 
  122:     %% THEN
  123:     ?assertMatch(ok, create_user(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, Config)),
  124:     ?assertMatch({ok, result, _},
  125:                  delete_user(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, Config)).
  126: 
  127: user_should_be_disconnected_from_removed_domain(Config) ->
  128:     %% GIVEN
  129:     Conn = connect_user(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, Config),
  130: 
  131:     %% WHEN
  132:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
  133: 
  134:     %% THEN
  135:     ?assertNot(escalus_connection:is_connected(Conn)).
  136: 
  137: 
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: %% Internal functions
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: 
  142: get_ejabberd_hosts() ->
  143:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_fun(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [hosts]).
  144: 
  145: reload_through_ctl(Config) ->
  146:     OutputStr = ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl(reload_local, Config),
  147:     ok = verify_reload_output(OutputStr).
  148: 
  149: verify_reload_output(OutputStr) ->
  150:     ExpectedOutput = ?CTL_RELOAD_OUTPUT_PREFIX,
  151:     case lists:sublist(OutputStr, length(ExpectedOutput)) of
  152:         ExpectedOutput ->
  153:             ok;
  154:         _ ->
  155:             ct:pal("~ts", [OutputStr]),
  156:             error(config_reload_failed, [OutputStr])
  157:     end.
  158: 
  159: register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(User, Host) ->
  160:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_fun(ejabberd_admin, register,
  161:                                  [User, Host, <<"doctor">>]).
  162: 
  163: unregister_user_by_ejabberd_admin(User, Host) ->
  164:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_fun(ejabberd_admin, unregister, [User, Host]).
  165: 
  166: change_domain_in_config_file(Config) ->
  167:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(
  168:       [mk_value_for_hosts_pattern(?RELOADED_DOMAIN)], Config).
  169: 
  170: mk_value_for_hosts_pattern(Domain) ->
  171:     {hosts, "[\"" ++ binary_to_list(Domain) ++ "\"]"}.
  172: 
  173: run_config_file_modification_fun(Config) ->
  174:     Fun = ?config(modify_config_file_fun, Config),
  175:     Fun(Config).
  176: 
  177: create_user_in_initial_domain(User, Config) ->
  178:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [User]}).
  179: 
  180: delete_user_in_initial_domain(User, Config) ->
  181:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [User]}).
  182: 
  183: connect_user(User, Config) ->
  184:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  185:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec),
  186:     Conn.
  187: 
  188: get_user_domain(User) ->
  189:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  190:     proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec).
  191: 
  192: create_user(User, Config) ->
  193:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  194:     Result = escalus_users:create_user(Config, {User, UserSpec}),
  195:     escalus_users:verify_creation(Result).
  196: 
  197: delete_user(User, Config) ->
  198:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  199:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, {User, UserSpec}).
